1.name: Hocus Pocus
1.description: A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.

2.name: Addams Family Values
2.description: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

3.name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
3.description: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

4.name: Dazed and Confused
4.description: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

5.name: Schindler's List
5.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

6.name: Jurassic Park
6.description: A pragmatic Paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

7.name: Tombstone
7.description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

8.name: True Romance
8.description: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

9.name: The Fugitive
9.description: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

10.name: Mrs. Doubtfire
10.description: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

11.name: A Bronx Tale
11.description: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

12.name: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
12.description: After his father's death, Gilbert has to care for his mentally-disabled brother, Arnie, and his morbidly obese mother. This situation is suddenly challenged though, when love unexpectedly walks into his life.

13.name: Indecent Proposal
13.description: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

14.name: The Piano
14.description: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

15.name: The Age of Innocence
15.description: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

16.name: Groundhog Day
16.description: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

17.name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
17.description: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

18.name: Falling Down
18.description: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

19.name: Demolition Man
19.description: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

20.name: The Sandlot
20.description: In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.

21.name: Philadelphia
21.description: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

22.name: Rudy
22.description: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

23.name: The Firm
23.description: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

24.name: Bound by Honor
24.description: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

25.name: Last Action Hero
25.description: With the help of a magic ticket, a young movie fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action movie character.

26.name: Super Mario Bros.
26.description: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

27.name: The Remains of the Day
27.description: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

28.name: Naked
28.description: Parallel tales of two sexually obsessed men, one hurting and annoying women physically and mentally, one wandering around the city talking to strangers and experiencing dimensions of life.

29.name: Free Willy
29.description: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

30.name: Carlito's Way
30.description: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

31.name: Cliffhanger
31.description: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

32.name: Sleepless in Seattle
32.description: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

33.name: The Secret Garden
33.description: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings -- and its secrets.

34.name: In the Name of the Father
34.description: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

35.name: In the Line of Fire
35.description: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

36.name: Sliver
36.description: A woman moves into an exclusive New York City apartment building, which she soon discovers houses tenants with all manner of shocking secrets.

37.name: The Three Musketeers
37.description: France, 1625: Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers but the evil cardinal's disbanded them - save 3. He meets the 3, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.

38.name: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
38.description: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

39.name: The Crush
39.description: A journalist becomes the unwanted center of attention for a 14-year-old girl, who proceeds to sabotage his life after he refuses her sexual advances.

40.name: Coneheads
40.description: Aliens with conical crania crash-land on Earth.

41.name: Leprechaun
41.description: An evil, sadistic Leprechaun goes on a killing rampage in search of his beloved pot of gold.

42.name: Menace II Society
42.description: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

43.name: Much Ado About Nothing
43.description: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

44.name: Fire in the Sky
44.description: An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975.

45.name: Dennis the Menace
45.description: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

46.name: Alive
46.description: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

47.name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
47.description: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

48.name: So I Married an Axe Murderer
48.description: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

49.name: Gettysburg
49.description: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

50.name: Return of the Living Dead III
50.description: Having recently witnessed the horrific results of a top secret project to bring the dead back to life, a distraught youth performs the operation on his girlfriend after she's killed in a motorcycle accident.
